Description

CreateEventFragment - This fragment will be displayed whenever a GeneralUser wants to organize an event.

Event
Represents an Event within the Dangle Lotto system.
EventCardAdapter
EventCardAdapter - Custom event card adapter to be used when you want to display events in a recycler view.
EventCardAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface for handling clicks on event cards.
EventCardAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder for an individual event card.
EventDetailFragment
Displays the full details of an event and handles user interaction depending on their event participation state.

Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.

FirebaseManager
FirebaseManager — handles all Firebase-related operations for authentication, users, and events.
GeneralUser
GeneralUser — model for a general application user (entrant or organizer).

HomeFragment - Fragment shows events that user can click for more info.

LoginActivity - Activity for logging in.
